page.title: 20My House near Sarn
page.content: My house is near Sarn.In it we have six{bedrooms}and we use two of them and the rest are for{bed and {breakfast.}About three or four come at a time.We have one{bathroom.}There are three people living with me.We have a small garden compared with some people.Downstairs we have a{kitchen, and a place to put your wellies that we call a{wash house.}We have a toilet downstairs.My house is in the country. It is a farm house.I sleep in the {attic.}There are two rooms.Our house is quite big downstairs.We have six rooms, not including the{toilet.}We have all the meals in the{kitchen}but not if someone comes.It is nice living here.
